title: Interpretation of the spasms that affect the body’s organs according to Imam Al-Sadiq, peace be upon him  Spasms of organs in the human body

preview.html: We present to you CG Arabic followers the latest and most important topics that are constantly being researched, which are physical spasms and what are the correct explanations for spasms in any part of the human body, as there are many of them. Those who suffer from spasms are very confused and want to know what is the interpretation of these involuntary movements that occur for a few seconds in a part of our body. In turn, we publish for you the interpretation of spasms, citing reliable sources, in a program that makes it easy for you to identify them and download them to your phone so that you can learn the interpretation of spasms permanently...Interpretation of spasms. Imam Al-Sadiq What is the explanation for the natural spasms that occur in the human body, according to Imam Al-Sadiq’s explanations for everyone who wants to know the science of spasms, what is its definition, what this science teaches, and what is the specialty? We have dedicated this article to you to explain to all followers of the Arabic website CG Dream Interpretation what has been studied, what is the specialty and science of seizures, and what are their correct interpretations, as we will answer all the questions they want. To know the science of seizures and their explanations and interpretations of the involuntary movements of the body’s organs and the interpretation of spasms for all parts of the upper and lower part of the human body, follow us. What is epilepsy and what does it specialize in? It is worth noting that the science of seizures is the science specialized in studying all involuntary movements arising from the organs of the human body, and seizures is a science of one The branches of physiognomy examine body expressions. The science of spasms on the organs of the human body is known as the science that studies the influence of the human body on the movements that make angels act in the human body, leading to involuntary movements whose explanations humans know. Seizures and their interpretationFor all who ask what is the science of spasms, it is one of the sciences that deals with the study Body organs and their involuntary movements. The science of spasms is branched out from the branches of physiognomy. This spasm often occurs in various organs of the body, whether it is in the upper limbs of the body and starts from the top of the head to the lower limbs until the end of the foot. In a simplified definition of spasms, it is the effect of the human body through the movements of angels that... They come down from the sky and are reflected in their movement towards us as a result of the tide of life and as another connection between the universe. And a man. We publish for you here the most important explanations of the science of convulsions for the fluttering of any part of the body, quoting from one of the international websites interested in such sciences in involuntary movements of the body, and quoting a confirmed interpretation of the science of convulsions. Convulsions from the books of the imams and what was transmitted from the sources of the books of Imam Al-Sadiq, peace be upon him, “the grandson of the Messenger of God from his father, Ali bin Al-Hussein bin Ali bin Abi Talib.” Peace be upon them. Interpretation of spasms in the upper body. Head and fountains. The king’s wound, honour, money, and the handsome male. The main mother. Kindness, love and health in those who fail. The head and fontanelle. It works well. The right section of the head. A wide livelihood. The left head section. A journey in which there is goodness and joy. In front of me is a good injury, and in a narration the Sultan is afraid. The right temple. Joy and pleasure and the news of death near it. The left temple is theirs.

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a sheikh in a dream - seeing a cleric in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a sheikh in a dream - seeing a religious man in a dream. Likewise, seeing a religious sheikh in a dream indicates good news and happiness for the dreamer and his family. Learn more about Moments website in the interpretation of dreams. You can see: Interpretation of a dream about magic in a dream, which came from the kindness of seeing a religious sheikh in Seeing a sheikh or a religious man in a dream has many different meanings, one of which indicates wisdom. It either indicates patience or indicates judgment and knowledge. Likewise, seeing a religious sheikh symbolizes good deeds and acts of obedience that the dreamer performs. Likewise, seeing a sheikh in a dream indicates authority. Or the ruler and indicates the benevolence and prestige with which the dreamer will be afflicted. Whoever sees in a dream that an old man is speaking to him or addressing him in a dream, this is a warning and a warning to the dreamer of the necessity of refraining from disobedience and transgression. It is said: The words of the sheikh are a message from God Almighty to the servant. If the sheikh is of A thick, white beard, then he may be a prophet. Whoever sees in a dream that an old man gives him water to drink, this indicates the great and elevated status of the god. Or if he sees that he gave him some wine, this shows you the reward that the fortuneteller will receive as a result of performing various deeds. If The old man gave him milk, so he shows a pure heart, a good reward, and good deeds. Whoever sees in a dream that he is kissing an old man, it is a sign of the dreamer’s good reputation and good behavior among people, and it is a protection from evil and evil that may befall the dreamer. If a woman sees that she is kissing the old man’s hand This indicates a woman’s kindness and good behavior. If a person dreams that he married an old man, this indicates the wealth and knowledge that the dreamer will experience. Whoever sees in a dream the presence of a religious sheikh sleeping, his expression will be on the dreamer’s conscience. Whoever sees in a dream that the religious sheikh has returned to a young man, This indicates his good fortune, an increase in his wealth, and an increase in his strength. Likewise, seeing a religious sheikh in a dream indicates good news and joy that befalls the dreamer and his family. What does he say in a dream about the evil of seeing a religious sheikh? Whoever sees the presence of a religious sheikh preaching to people and is unable to deliver his message or make... People understand. What he meant by his words and his inability to guide and correct indicates a calamity or illness that befell the priest. Whoever sees a group of people taking something from the sheikh of religion that he did not intend, this indicates a new calamity for the pioneer. God knows best. Interpretation of the dream of Sheikh Ibn Sirin. The sheikh in a dream by Ibn Sirin announces that he is a person capable of performing the duties of the Islamic religion. Seeing the sheikh in a dream indicates the dreamer’s desire to benefit from knowledge. Seeing the sheikh in a dream indicates the death of misfortunes and worries. Whoever sees in a dream that before An old man, this is evidence of his good conduct and reputation. Seeing an old man in a dream is that he is unable to convey information to people who are suffering from signs of illness and suffering. Sometimes seeing an old man in a dream may mean a long life. Interpretation of a dream about Sheikh Nabulsi If one sees in a dream that he is talking to an old man, then this It means that he has been warned of the sins and disobedience he is committing. If the sheikh gives water to the pioneer in a dream, this indicates that the

title: Interpretation of the dream of seeing a wig in a dream by Ibn Sirin and the most important clues about it

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a wig in a dreamInterpretation of a dream about seeing a wig in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Imam Al-Sadiq - Nazati MagazineThe vision of connecting hair, a wig is a wig that women and men wear to change their appearance and when they see a wig in a dream, it will definitely have another interpretation and today we will explain to you the interpretation of the dream about a wig In a dream for single people, married people, pregnant women, and men, seeing a wig in a dream indicates deception and hypocrisy, as well as problems and disagreements, as well as pretending to violate the internal rules and the failure and victory of enemies over the dreamer. It also indicates the dreamer’s attempt to change his life for the better, as it symbolizes the attachment of an unmarried girl, while it warns A wig falling out means revealing a secret that the dreamer was hiding from himself or a problem that he will face. And the vision carries different connotations, and we will explain the interpretation of the dream of seeing a wig in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Imam al-Sadiq - Nazrati Magazine. Interpretation of seeing a wig by Ibn Sirin. The interpretation of a wig in a dream indicates hypocrisy, deception, lies, and the emergence of many disputes in the life of the fortuneteller. If you see a wig in a dream, this It means that you face many difficulties and obstacles to achieve your desired goals. Interpretation of a dream about tying hair according to Ibn Sirin in a dream may indicate betrayal of a close person. Wearing a wig in a dream is evidence of the dreamer’s pursuit of his ambitions and aspirations and his success in doing so. As for the falling of a wig in a dream, it indicates The failure and victory of enemies pricks the dreamer. Interpretation of seeing a lot of wigs in a dream is evidence of many problems and sorrows in the life of the dreamer. Continue also: Interpretation of dreaming of seeing a wig in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Imam Al-Sadiq. Interpretation of a dream about a wig for a single woman. Interpretation of a wig in a dream for an unmarried woman It is an undesirable dream for her, as it indicates the abundance of hypocrites and haters, and she should beware of them. The interpretation of seeing a wig falling out in a dream for a single woman is evidence of the collapse of fears and the end of the state of depression that you have been experiencing during the past period. A dream in which a wig is being combed indicates For a single woman, it indicates her relationship with a person who does not suit her and who may mistreat her, causing her sadness. An unmarried woman who sees a wig falling from someone she knows in a dream is evidence that she will soon discover this person. To see yourself wearing a wig and be happy in a woman’s dream An unmarried woman may indicate concealment and close marriage. Interpretation of a dream about a wig for a married woman. Interpretation of a dream about a long wig in a dream for a married woman indicates that there are people who conspire against her and want to harm her. Seeing a short wig in a dream for a married woman is considered an undesirable dream, because it indicates Harm and harm to her children or a family member. A dream of wearing a wig in a dream for a married woman indicates that she is going through bad financial circumstances and disagreements with her husband that may lead to separation. The interpretation of a wig falling in a married woman’s dream is evidence of her victory over her enemies and enemies.

If you see a wig in a dream, this It means that you face many difficulties and obstacles to achieve your desired goals. Interpretation of a dream about tying hair according to Ibn Sirin in a dream may indicate betrayal of a close person. Wearing a wig in a dream is evidence of the dreamer’s pursuit of his ambitions and aspirations and his success in doing so. As for the falling of a wig in a dream, it indicates The failure and victory of enemies pricks the dreamer. Interpretation of seeing a lot of wigs in a dream is evidence of many problems and sorrows in the life of the dreamer. Continue also: Interpretation of dreaming of seeing a wig in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Imam Al-Sadiq. Interpretation of a dream about a wig for a single woman. Interpretation of a wig in a dream for an unmarried woman It is an undesirable dream for her, as it indicates the abundance of hypocrites and haters, and she should beware of them. The interpretation of seeing a wig falling out in a dream for a single woman is evidence of the collapse of fears and the end of the state of depression that you have been experiencing during the past period. A dream in which a wig is being combed indicates For a single woman, it indicates her relationship with a person who does not suit her and who may mistreat her, causing her sadness. An unmarried woman who sees a wig falling from someone she knows in a dream is evidence that she will soon discover this person. To see yourself wearing a wig and be happy in a woman’s dream An unmarried woman may indicate concealment and close marriage. Interpretation of a dream about a wig for a married woman. Interpretation of a dream about a long wig in a dream for a married woman indicates that there are people who conspire against her and want to harm her. Seeing a short wig in a dream for a married woman is considered an undesirable dream, because it indicates Harm and harm to her children or a family member. A dream of wearing a wig in a dream for a married woman indicates that she is going through bad financial circumstances and disagreements with her husband that may lead to separation. The interpretation of a wig falling in a married woman’s dream is evidence of her victory over her enemies and enemies.

title: The most important interpretations of Ibn Sirin for seeing the sun in a dream

preview.html: Seeing the sun in a dreamThe sun is the central star of the solar system and illuminates our Earth. In winter, when the clouds come, we all wait for the sunrise to warm up. Seeing the sun in a dream raises many questions about whether it is good or not? In the science of dream interpretation, it has many connotations, including praiseworthy and unpleasant connotations, which vary from one case to another depending on the state of the fortuneteller. We will explain all the cases and their interpretations in the following article: Seeing the sun in a dream. Seeing the sun in a dream and standing under it with its rays indicates that God has granted the dreamer security and health. The presence of a strong red sun in the dreamer indicates the emergence of many conflicts in his life. Seeing the sun shining in The sky is evidence of the maturity of the visionary’s thinking and his aspirations for the future, as well as experiencing a lot of progress and prosperity in his life. The sunset in the dream symbolizes that the dreamer will hear a lot of good news, the occurrence of some occasions and celebrations, and the acquisition of great wealth. In the event that he sees the sun shining in the sky as well This indicates that many positive changes will occur in the dreamer’s life and a stable and peaceful life. The sun in a dream is an indication that the dreamer will be able to achieve all the goals and desires that he seeks to achieve. The sun hiding behind the clouds is evidence that there are some things that cause fear. And anxiety for the dreamer and makes him feel sad and sad. Dreaming of the sun reflecting from the east on the water means that the dreamer has to deal with people who do not fulfill their promises. Seeing the sunrise on the beach indicates that the dreamer is in a hurry to make decisions and does not think in an appropriate way. If In his dream, the dreamer saw strong sunlight falling on his body. This symbolizes the presence in the life of a person with power and influence who protects the dreamer from all harm. Seeing the sunrise clearly in a dream is a sign that some new things will happen that will bring joy and happiness to the heart. A sunrise The sun from the dreamer’s house indicates that he will be blessed with many good things, and as Al-Nabulsi mentioned, the sun in the house symbolizes gold. Seeing the sun in a dream by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin interpreted that seeing the sun in a dream surrounded by clouds and dust and causing its lack of light is a sign of some problems in the dreamer’s house. The dreamer's life, and if he is sick, the vision will lead to its deterioration. His health, which may lead to his death. The dreamer who sees the sun dark in a dream is a sign of his inability to distinguish between right and wrong. Dreaming of bright sunshine means receiving kindness and abundant nourishment, and the dreamer enjoys a lot of useful information and knowledge. The person who sees the sun entering His house in a dream is a sign that he will receive a lot of money. If the dreamer sees that the sun is setting and is following him, this symbolizes the approaching date of his meeting with God Almighty. The appearance of the sun in the fortuneteller’s dream, and it was strong, and he recognized it, which indicates that he will be arrested. By an owner or a person with influence and authority. The sun is red

title: What is the interpretation of seeing a lupine in a dream?

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing lupine by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of seeing lupine in a dream. If it is green, it shows a lot of money that the dreamer gets, but after fatigue, toil, and trouble. Dry lupine in a dream is a sign of the strife and sadness that the dreamer is suffering from. Boiled lupine in a dream indicates abundance of sustenance and plenty Of money. As for soaking lupine in water, it can be evidence of recovery from diseases that afflict the fortuneteller. Interpretation of a dream about lupine by Al-Nabulsi: Dreaming about a green lupine in a dream shows that it is being saved, but after extreme fatigue. Seeing a dry lupine in a dream is a sign of anxiety and sadness that is afflicting it. The dreamer. Seeing lupine for single people. A dream about eating lupine in an unmarried woman’s dream is evidence of a lot of money and a great diet. Eating dried lupine in a dream is a sign of stinginess and deprives this girl of many things. If an unmarried girl sees a boiled lupine in a dream, this It indicates money that will be easy to obtain. As for the dream of seeing a ground lupine in a dream, it is evidence of getting rid of worries and problems. Interpretation of a dream about a lupine for a married woman. Dried lupine in a dream. Women and a married woman is a sign of goodness and is one of the praiseworthy visions. A ground lupine in a dream indicates positive changes. Which occurs in the life of this woman. Interpretation of a dream about lupine for a pregnant woman. If a pregnant woman dreams that she is eating bitter lupine, this indicates nourishment for the male child. Eating lupine indicates the birth of a female. A dream about lupine for a man. Seeing wild: The green color in a man’s dream indicates kindness and abundance of sustenance. As for To see dry lupine in a man’s dream, this may indicate that you are spending a lot of money, and it also indicates obtaining a lot of money but from an unknown source. If a man eats ground lupine in a dream, this indicates big problems and troubles that the dreamer will fall into Seeing yourself distributing thermos to family and relatives in a dream is evidence of nourishment, kindness, and happiness. Add the dream that you would like to interpret by referring to your marital status in a comment below the article, and we will respond to it and clarify it.

title: Interpretation of the dream of seeing a dead person in a dream for a single woman, a married woman, and a man according to Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a deceased person in a dream: Bad dreams are from Satan, and in order for them not to come true, a Muslim must blow to the right and left three times, and not tell anyone about it or occupy his time thinking about it. His vision was closer to verification and vice versa, and in this article we present the interpretation of the dream of seeing the deceased in a dream.Interpretation of the dream of seeing the deceased in a dreamThe dreamer who sees a dead person dancing in a dream is a sign for the deceased that he is happy with his death, but in the event that he sees the dead person doing forbidden things, this means that the dreamer He does things that are not so. Good, and it is a warning to the dreamer to stay away from these prohibitions and get closer to the Holy God. Also, seeing the deceased doing good deeds is evidence to the monarch that he is a just and pious person, and this vision urges the monarch to do more charitable and righteous deeds. In the event that he sees the dead in an unknown and unclear area and it is Happy to see that area and feel psychologically comfortable, this is evidence that the fortuneteller will obtain abundant provision, God willing. Seeing the dreamer teaching the dead is evidence that he is a good person who seeks to enjoin good and forbid evil and helps people follow the right path. If the dreamer sees that he is descending to The grave, this is evidence that he has committed many sins and sins, including adultery. When the dreamer sees a fire burning in the grave of a dead person, this vision shows that the dreamer has committed many sins and this vision came as a warning about what he is doing and that he should correct what he is doing. See also: Interpretation Dreams of seeing rain in a dream for single and married women. Interpretation of seeing the dead alive in a dream. Seeing the dead alive in a dream in a dream is accompanied by various interpretations, the most important of which is seeing the dead alive in a dream, evidence of facilitating the dreamer’s condition and meeting his needs and difficult matters for him in that he does not take into account and we will explain in The following interpretation of the dream of seeing dead people in a dream at these points: Seeing familiar dead people in the dreamer’s dream as they come from somewhere, wearing new clothes and showing a state of joy and happiness, and the interpretation of this vision is evidence of the appearance of something of great goodness, joy and happiness. The dreamer or the dead are in a better condition. Seeing the parents in a dream while they are alive in the dream and the dreamer is overcome with fear, so his worry and anxiety go away, especially when he sees his mother. See also: Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of the dream of seeing a child in a dream about a free and single woman. The interpretation of seeing a dead person in a dream for a pregnant woman may A pregnant woman is afraid when she sees a dead person in a dream, for fear that her fetus will be harmed or harmed, but contrary to this belief, the interpretation of seeing a dead person in a dream for a pregnant woman according to Ibn Sirin is good. . And good news for her and her fetus, and in these lines we explain the interpretation of this vision: If a pregnant woman sees a dead person giving her something, this is evidence that the time of birth is approaching, and that her new baby will enjoy health and God bless. If the pregnant woman sees that the dead person is warning her, then she must protect herself and her fetus with dhikr and legal ruqyah. If a pregnant woman sees a dead woman smiling, this vision indicates that she will die

The seer or the dead are in a better condition. If a pregnant woman sees that the dead person is warning her, she must protect herself and her fetus with remembrance and legal ruqyah. If a pregnant woman sees a dead person smiling, this vision indicates that she will give birth to a child.

title: Seeing a man from me in a dream

preview.html: Seeing a man’s semen in a dream. A man’s semen is a liquid that comes out during lust, during intercourse, wet dreams, or masturbation. It is a white, sticky liquid, and seeing it in a dream indicates many meanings, all of which indicate goodness except in rare cases. . Wishes and marriage for an unmarried young man and girl. As for masturbation, it indicates the acquisition of money, but through illegal means and forbidden money. Interpretation of a dream about the color of a white man’s sperm for a married woman. Seeing a white man’s sperm indicates an abundance of sustenance and an abundance of goodness for the dreamer. Sperm indicates The abundance of money, even if there is debt, indicates the repayment of debts and freedom from distress. The white color of sperm indicates happiness and stability. It indicates good offspring despite the large number of numbers about large offspring. Seeing semen like fire indicates the status and goodness of the child. I see semen. A man I know in a dream about single womenSeeing a famous man from me is one of the dreams that indicates an imminent marriage for a girl, predictions of a good marriage, good offspring, happiness and prosperity. Seeing sperm also indicates the fulfillment of dreams and desires and hearing good news. Seeing a strange man from me in a dream For a single woman, seeing unknown sperm indicates that he will receive money that may be from inheritance. Seeing strange sperm indicates joy, pleasure, intelligence, and sophistication. Seeing sperm also indicates success and success in professional life. Interpretation of a dream about a famous man in a dream for a single man or young man. Sperm in a man or young man’s dream indicates the satisfaction of a need or the satisfaction of a desire. Seeing an abundance of sperm indicates a good life and the dreamer will have a lot of money. Seeing a man or young man masturbating or masturbating could mean bringing money or earning it illegally. Seeing a young man’s sperm indicates his imminent marriage. Interpretation of a dream of a well-known man for a divorced woman. Seeing sperm in a divorced woman’s dream indicates the abundance of food and many good things that she will receive. It also indicates that she saw me leaving a well-known man, promising the fulfillment of her dreams and desires and that she She will get money soon or get a prestigious job. The vision also indicates that she will marry again or return to her ex-husband if there is love or hope of returning. Interpretation of a dream about a black man having sex with me for a divorced woman. Seeing a man having sex with a woman is one of the visions that It portends many pleasant and enjoyable surprises for the dreamer. It also indicates that the difficult stages have been passed successfully. Seeing marriage or sexual intercourse indicates the acquisition of money or inheritance. Interpretation of a dream about a man’s sperm in the vagina for a single woman. Seeing the release of semen is one of the dreams that may worry the girl, but it is a vision It is good and indicates hearing happy news and a stable life. Seeing my vagina also means getting rid of stress and anxiety and overcoming difficult stages. Seeing semen coming out of the vagina also indicates

title: Interpretation of seeing a rich man in a dream

preview.html: A rich man in a dream basically symbolizes good luck, and it has been said: A rich man in a dream, if he is generous, is a sign of abundant food or profit, and if he is miserable or meager, then it is... A sign of fatigue or unhappiness. A rich man in one dream. If an unmarried girl sees that she is in the presence of a rich man and sees that he treats her well and his words are kind, then this is her interpretation of goodness. If a man puts his hand in his pocket and takes out a simple coin, then gives it to the girl who saw the dream, and she kisses him on the Reluctantly, this is his interpretation of losing an opportunity to work, earn, or get married. She does not know in her life how to value her value. But if an unmarried girl sees that she is traveling with a rich man in a luxury car or enters his house and sees blessings in it, this is a very good interpretation, as it is very likely that the girl will marry someone. A prestigious position or has abilities not available to anyone else. The dream can also indicate very positive changes on a practical level, perhaps the girl will get a prestigious job that will make her able to achieve her dreams. Interpretation of seeing a wealthy or wealthy man in a married woman’s dreamIf a married woman sees in her dream that her husband has become wealthy, rich, or worthy, This interpretation is better, God willing, as the dream indicates a clear improvement in the living situation or a positive change in the husband’s situation. . And behavior towards his wife, and wealth or wealth in this context may indicate generosity or justice, as the issue is in religion and in the world. As for a married woman who sees in her dream a man who is a stranger to her and who has signs of wealth appearing in her house, or sitting at the table with her, or talking to her children, or playing With them smiling and cheerful, this is interpreted as success for all family members. He is overcome with happiness, for if a rich man enters a woman's house and sleeps in her husband's bed, then the pregnancy will be short and blessed. It is a great thing provided that it is not reprehensible or ugly. Interpretation of a rich or wealthy man in a dream for a pregnant woman. As for a pregnant woman who sees in her dream that she knows a rich man and the manifestations of wealth are seen through his clothes, car, or luxurious house, this is a good interpretation and symbolizes ease in any matter. . Mahmoud (Muhammad, Karim, Salim, Fathi, Nour, Murad) All of these names indicate a wish that has been fulfilled, or happy news knocking on the door, or a very wonderful event awaiting the pregnant woman at the turn of the road, and this means the outcome of the situation. Interpretation of a dream about marrying a rich manWoman Whether she is (single, pregnant, married, divorced or widowed), if she sees a rich man and talks to him or sits with him, she will fulfill a cherished wish. Especially if their wedding took place in a dream without events such as (song, dance, play), because the wedding in this context can turn into a bad symbol in the vision. The best of all good is that a woman does not see her daughter’s husband’s face, and the good thing is also that he is unknown, strange and unknown. When you become rich or wealthy in your dream, it is like wealth or wealth in the vision, it is like power and beauty, as all these concepts express external and internal blessings.
